#summary The keygen element is an obsolete method of managing web-based security certificates.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-mozilla

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *keygen element*

== Usage ==

Do not use `<keygen>`.  [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] is the only browser that understands this element.

== Attributes ==

  * [KeygenChallengeAttribute challenge]
  * [KeygenKeytypeAttribute keytype]
  * [KeygenNameAttribute name]
  * [KeygenPqgAttribute pqg]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
